General.Name: Savezone I C
General.Description: Savezone I&C Corporation operates fashion discount stores in South Korea. It also operates convenience facilities, such as a cultural and sports centers. The company was formerly known as Uless Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Savezone I&C Corporation in 2004. Savezone I&C Corporation was founded in 2002 and is headquartered in Seoul, South Korea.
